snippet: The hearing came at a time when the N.C.A.A. was facing increased scrutiny on a number of fronts.
abstract: Democratic Sen Jay Rockefeller of West Virginia, during Senate Commerce hearing on NCAA's treatment of college athletes, voices his anger at the state of college sports; echoes critics who have bemoaned its professionalization, and perception that increasing revenue is not being fairly shared with athletes; hearing comes at time when NCAA is facing increased scrutiny on number of fronts.
lead_paragraph: The hearing came at a time when the N.C.A.A. was facing increased scrutiny on a number of fronts.

headline.main: Senate Committee Presses N.C.A.A., Signaling Interest in Direction of College Sports
headline.print_headline: Senate Committee Presses N.C.A.A., Signaling Interest in Direction of College Sports
